publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3013 Rosie Kane: The Education Service—That the Parliament thanks the primary 6 pupils from Corpus Christi Primary School, Glasgow, who visited the Scottish Parliament on Tuesday 21 June 2005 as guests of the Scottish Parliament Education Service, for their well-thought-out and challenging questions; recognises the excellent work carried out by the Education Service in the Parliament; notes the skill with which the education officers adapt their presentation to include the many age groups who visit, and looks forward to seeing many more young people enjoy and learn about the Scottish Parliament through the Education Service.

S2M-3013 Rosie Kane: The Education Service—That the Parliament thanks the primary 6 pupils from Corpus Christi Primary School, Glasgow, who visited the Scottish Parliament on Tuesday 21 June 2005 as guests of the Scottish Parliament Education Service, for their well-thought-out and challenging questions; recognises the excellent work carried out by the Education Service in the Parliament; notes the skill with which the education officers adapt their presentation to include the many age groups who visit, and looks forward to seeing many more young people enjoy and learn about the Scottish Parliament through the Education Service.
S2M-3013 The Education Service (lodged on 21 June 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
